DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study compare functional performance individual transtibial amputation use two type prosthetic foot design : carbon fiber vs. fiberglass composite .
DOC.brief_title: Comparative Performance Dynamic Elastic Response Feet
DOC.detailed_description: Recently , new type prosthetic foot appear market . This device compose fiberglass composite material . Knowledge lack regard performance characteristic new device . Comprehensive study need form solid basis prosthetic prescription . The current study seek understand experience community-living , transtibial amputee use prosthetic foot . Specifically , biomechanical performance device compare exist conventional DER technology control laboratory setting . The investigator hypothesize fiberglass composite material provide energy return improve ankle kinematics performance .
DOC.criteria: Unilateral transtibial amputee Currently use carbon fiber prosthetic ( DER ) foot least last 6 month Stable stump volume past 6 month Medicare Functional Classification Level K3 K4 Neuromuscular problem previous stroke contralateral amputation Use gait aid ambulation Undergoing dialysis Poor prosthetic socket fit stump problem ( e.g. , skin breakdown )
